sentence.Network_en: The surface electromyogram ( EMG ) and integrated EMG ( IEMG ) during fatiguingisometrie contraction at 70 % MVC were recorded.
sentence.Network_cn: 在维持70%MVC等长 收缩至疲劳过程中,记录股外肌表面肌电图 ( EMG ) 信号和积分肌电图 ( IEMG ) 信号.

sentence.Network_en: AIM : To detect surface electromyogram EMG signal accurately.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 准确地检测表面肌电信号.

sentence.Network_en: Electromyogram ( EMG ) is employed to help determine the control signal used to actuate the muscle cylinders.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用了肌电图 ( EMG ) 来帮助确定用于促动肌肉圆柱的控制信号.
